Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2017 07:57AM montanalivin wrote: Hi been lurking here for awhile, this site is so great for information, and you make everyone feel welcome! I finished chemo in June of 2016, finished Herceptin in Feb. 2017. Had a cat scan in March on lungs. they found left lung with 2 3MM spots and 1 6mm, right lung with 2 3mm spots. Just had a follow up scan showed left lung 3 3mm and 1 7mm and right 5 3-4mm spots. But the Radiologist states unchanged in appearance and suggest follow up in 12 months. Does this sound right? how can it be unchanged with the 6mm now 7mm and 4 more spots found.
Posts.Title: If you are not Stage IV but have questions, you may post here chrissyb Olma61
